text:
This Video Of SRK-Salman Jamming Together Will Make You Want To Call Your BFF For A Reunion!
This Video Of SRK-Salman Jamming Together Will Make You Want To Call Your BFF For A Reunion!
The 'Khans' might not have been able to be the perfect crowd-pullers in the cinema halls this time but they for sure know how to win hearts.
A lot has been written over the years about Salman and Shah Rukh Khan's friendship.
Their friendship had hit a rough patch but since last few years, their friendship has remained rock solid. From rooting for each other's films to making public appearances together, Shah Rukh Khan and Salman are the BFF's that this industry should look up to.
Colors
Recently, Salman Khan threw a lavish birthday bash and even though SRK couldn't make it, their fans still have a reason to rejoice.
An old video of SRK-Salman jamming on 'Pyaar Hume Kis Mod Pe Le Aaya' is doing rounds on the internet. The video sums up their equation through the years and this video will definitely make you want to call your besties for a new year's reunion.
Screengrab
Don't Miss 812 SHARES 343 SHARES 3 K SHARES 555 SHARES 4 K SHARES
Without further ado, watch the video right here.
title: This Video Of SRK-Salman Jamming Together Will Make You Want To Call Your BFF For A Reunion!
description: An old video of SRK-Salman jamming on 'Pyaar Hume Kis Mod Pe Le Aaya' is doing rounds on the internet. The video sums up their equation through the years and this video will definitely make you want to call your besties for a new year's reunion. Watch the video now.
